charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Selene in town,
who seemed to be deep in thought about
something...
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_0400:
I was so caught up in my thoughts, I didn’t see
you there!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_0500:
I was thinking about how I could become better
friends with Nihilego.
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_0600:
Nihilego is a Pokémon from another world called
Ultra Space.
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_0700:
It’s a little different from the Pokémon we’re used
to seeing.
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_0800:
That’s why I wanna get closer with Nihilego on its
own terms!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_0900:
So I’ve just been thinking about how I could
do that!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_0401_1100:
Uh-huh! We’re gonna take our friendship to new
levels—there’s no limit to how strong our bond
can get!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_0402_1300: Ahaha. Well...I’m kinda struggling a bit.
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_1400:
Lately, I’ve been trying to come up with a greeting
that Nihilego would understand!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_1500:
I thought something like “Ultra!” might be a good
Ultra Spacey way to greet it...
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_1600:
But it didn’t work...and I’ve tried so many different
ones, too.
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_1700:
If we had our own way of greeting each other
every day, I’m sure we’d get closer!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_1800:
When I moved to Alola, I was able to connect with
the locals because we’d all greet each other with
a hearty “Alola!”
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_1900:
Anyway, there’s a lot I don’t quite get about
Nihilego...
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_2000:
but I feel like it’s starting to open up to me, little
by little!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_2100:
Isn’t it super exciting to think about Pokémon
like this?
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_2200:
It’s like going on an adventure! It’s so exciting to
slowly understand something you didn’t quite get
at first!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_2300:
Where’s the fun if you have everything figured out
from the start, right?
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_2400:
So I wanna become even better friends with
Nihilego using all kinds of ways—not just
a greeting!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_2500: You happen to have any ideas?
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_0401_2800:
That’s right! I knew you’d get it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_0402_3000: Hey! I know you already know the answer!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_3200:
Pokémon battles allow people and Pokémon to
connect, no matter how different they are!
charaepi_ch0123_80_mizuki/2301_1201_3400:
You’ll have a Pokémon battle with me and
Nihilego, right?
